content: Perhaps the end of rules is best. And the end of science-based reality. For example, gravity. People that I know are smart enough to grab onto something if they found themselves floating. Trumpsters would say, “Since gravity is science, then this isn’t real. And since no republican told me what to do, I’ll just trust Trump to tweet that this “floating off into space” thing isn’t really happening. Stupid liberals!” See? Not so bad…..
